NO REALTORS EXCEPT THE STATE â– THE COUNTY THE AGENT OF THE STATE â– THE ARCHITECT THE AGENT OF THE COUNTY It is clear that in Vekllei democracy is a way of living more than it is a form of government.

item.title: How to Speak Vekllei, and A New Website
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #7 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. For all you’ve seen of Vekllei and her characters, you’ve never heard a single one of them speak. This post marks a little exploration into the Vekllei language, and a ‘soft launch’ of my website, https://millmint.net. The proper launch will come at the end of the month.

item.title: Petrol Heaven â€” The Rohsm STR-750
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #6 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. The Rohsm STR series is a small racer built for clubs by Rohsm S.p.M., a hundred-year-old company headquartered in the Mediterranean racing culture of Tohs. Its most recent variant, the 750, is available in limited quantities to enthusiast owners and club pools.

item.title: Meet Tzipora â€” concept panel for a Vekllei comic
item.description: Archived from the original article here ðŸŒ¼ Featured in the Atlantic This article appeared in Issue #3 of the Atlantic Bulletin. You can read it here. Unique among girls # There are a lot of things Tzipora does differently to everybody else, and they start to make a lot more sense when you realise Tzipora either does not realise she is unusual, or does not care.
